title: How to Build an Audi R8 V10 Plus - /INSIDE QUATTRO
description: The R8 V10 Plus is a special Audi that shows off the craftsmanship of Quattro GmbH.  Leo Parente tours the special assembly shop where the R8 comes together.  While the shop is high-tech, there is still a hand-built element to the construction of the R8.
